title: King Charles and senior politicians to lead UK Remembrance Sunday service at Cenotaph – live
summary: A two-minute silence was observed at 11am GMT, marking a moment of remembrance. Commemorations took place throughout the UK, including cities like Edinburgh, Cardiff, and Belfast. These events honored a significant occasion collectively across the nation.

title: Liverpool travel to Manchester City, Premier League buildup and more – matchday live
summary: Join us for the latest news and discussions leading up to the day's events. Get previews and insights to stay informed. Don't miss out on the action!

title: A year on from Trump’s victory, resistance is everywhere | Rebecca Solnit
summary: Americans have demonstrated significant and diverse opposition to various issues, reflecting a wide range of perspectives. This opposition surpasses what many may perceive in the public discourse. The breadth of dissent illustrates the complexity of opinions within the nation.

title: Rescued California hunter thought he’d have to watch family ‘from heaven’ – and offers advice
summary: Ron Dailey, 65, endured nearly three weeks lost in the frigid wilderness after mistakenly taking a wrong turn. Despite the harsh conditions, he managed to survive until he was rescued. His survival story highlights both his resilience and the dangers of navigating remote areas.

title: This is how we do it: ‘The sex is so good I walk around with a ridiculous smile on my face’
summary: Claudine and John have revitalized their lives through dating apps, finding new opportunities for connection. They now prioritize quality time together to nurture their budding relationship. Their experiences highlight the potential of modern technology in fostering meaningful partnerships.
